title: ICE: Missing span for DefIndex(3) in compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:749

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code After `cargo new test-project`: * `lib.rs`: ```Rust macro_rules! foo_ { () => {}; } use foo_ as foo; ``` * `main.rs`: ```Rust #[macro_use] extern crate test_project; fn main() { foo!(); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.50.0-nightly (f76ecd066 2020-12-15) binary: rustc commit-hash: f76ecd0668fcdb289456cdc72a39ad15467cc454 commit-date: 2020-12-15 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.50.0-nightly ``` Reproducible on stable 1.48 as well ### Error output ``` Compiling test-project v0.1.0 warning: unused macro definition --> src/lib.rs:1:1 | 1 | macro_rules! foo_ { () => {}; } | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_macros)]` on by default warning: unused import: `foo_ as foo` --> src/lib.rs:2:5 | 2 | use foo_ as foo; | ^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default warning: 2 warnings emitted thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Missing span for DefIndex(3)', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:749:32 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-nightly (f76ecd066 2020-12-15) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `test-project` ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/f76ecd0668fcdb289456cdc72a39ad15467cc454/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/f76ecd0668fcdb289456cdc72a39ad15467cc454/library/std/src/panicking.rs:435:5 2: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::::get_span::{{closure}} 3: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::cstore_impl::::load_macro_untracked 4: rustc_resolve::build_reduced_graph::::get_macro_by_def_id 5: rustc_resolve::macros::::resolve_macro_path 6: rustc_resolve::macros::::resolve_macro_invocation 7: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::fully_expand_fragment 8: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::expand_crate 9: rustc_session::utils::::time 10: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand_inner 11: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand::{{closure}} 12: rustc_data_structures::box_region::PinnedGenerator::new 13: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 14: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::expansion 15: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 16: rustc_span::with_source_map 17: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 18: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
